# Session info

Print session info

```{r}
#| eval: false
sessionInfo()
```

Store session info
```{r}
my_sesh <- sessionInfo()
```

Save as RDS

```{r}
#| eval: false
saveRDS(my_sesh, here::here("scripts", "session_info_sessionInfo.rds"))
```

```{r}
old_sesh <- readRDS(here::here("scripts", "session_info_sessionInfo.rds"))
```

# Load packages

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```
